Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Biden is endorsed by BLM and Antifa, when in fact, BLM has not made any public endorsements and Antifa is not an organization that makes endorsements.
Understate: The claim understates by not acknowledging that Biden has received the backing of some law enforcement officials, despite Trump being endorsed by major law enforcement groups.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the endorsements it claims.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that endorsements from BLM and Antifa are negative or undesirable, while endorsements from the NRA and law enforcement are positive or desirable.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the endorsements, such as the personal opinions and beliefs of the individual members or co-founders of BLM and Antifa.
